alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Burnett; Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Pine, Bayfield, southern Douglas, northern Washburn, northwestern Ashland and northeastern Burnett Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Wing, to near Hawthorne, to near Cloverton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lake Nebagamon and Port Wing around 500 PM CDT. Herbster around 505 PM CDT. Barnes around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cornucopia, Drummond, Town of Delta, Ashland, Washburn, Wascott, Minong, Bayfield and La Pointe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Minnesota...and northwestern Wisconsin.
